comment._content: Hola, soy el administrador de un grupo llamado *Que bonito es Chihuahua ! ( Da 2 premios por imagen que subas ) y nos encantaría agregar esto al grupo.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
la fecha en la esquina superior izquierda es 5/16/11 (mayo 16 de 1911); esto es 6 dias después de la toma de Ciudad Juárez, Chih.
Dr. Roberto Duarte
Cirujano Plástico

comment._content: jerodamor@yahoo.com.mx:  thank you for finding the date on this negative.  We will add this information when we update.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: In www.flickr.com/photos/jesusduarte/5868105912/in/photostream you will find today's matching photo.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: I posted this picture in my PhotoStream someone comented it as wast taken at Avenida Lerdo and Calle Abram González , rather than avenida Lerdo and calle Manuel Bernal. Maybe he (she) is right. Because from the point he stablishes there are about 100 meters from the barricade to the federal headquarters www.flickr.com/photos/jesusduarte/5872145394/ . And makes sense for the barricades. It has to ve evaluated sister picture www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2162705877/ in which the irrigation canal is the clue. Acording to actual maps of the city the camera is facing towards the headquarters. The buildings depicted here exist no more. The irrigation canal does, but is covered at this level by some structures.
